body: Nah~ the one who said that the 2nd sister loves herself more is the older sister. The 2nd sister definitely is a yandere for her siblings. She loves him too much that's why she deleted his blog and caused him to break up with his girlfriend. She has been saying she loves him when she's raping him. She only wanted the 3 of them to be together forever "as one".

The last phrase says "Even though the older sister wishes happiness for her younger brother and loves him, she loves herself more than her brother". Like what??? Then what was the point of ruining her brother's relationship, if she's yandere for herself?
